20110118020915.000|20110118020917.000|TR0| I want her to be my friend.  That is what 
20110118020917.000|20110118020919.000|TR0|she said.       MORGAN:  The thing I know 
20110118020919.000|20110118020921.000|TR0|about you absolutely unequivocally is that 
20110118020921.000|20110118020923.000|TR0|everything you touch is a hit.
20110118020923.000|20110118020925.000|TR0|
20110118020925.000|20110118020927.000|TR0|WINFREY:  No.  That is not true.
